channel.title: Snowflake on Trip in Tech

item.title: Motive
item.description: Motive, formerly KeepTruckin, is an industry leader in empowering the people who run the physical economy. Wael, co-founder of Trip In Tech, led key engineering efforts at Motive for five years (2018-2023). His focus as a Lead Platform Engineer included security, infrastructure, developer productivity, and embedded systems. See some of his notable projects below. Building a High-Performance Development Ecosystem As a co-founder of Trip In Tech, my passion for optimizing developer workflows stems from my experience leading Motive’s developer productivity team.
